entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to flurries near midnight and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 80 early this evening then becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
